message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $970000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this unique item.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to consider $930000?

I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. I can offer it to you for $960000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above your last offer. Would you be willing to consider $920000?
